step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance. Ensure your palm and fingers are open wide for the next step.
Excellent! You're stretching your arm overhead. Remember to keep it straight and feel the resistance as you prepare to make a fist.
Great job opening your hand wide! Now, as you inhale, make a tight fist and tense your muscles.
Well done! You made a fist while inhaling and tensing. Now, exhale and relax your hand, opening your fingers wide.
Second rep, looking good! Continue to stretch your arm straight overhead and maintain that feeling of resistance.
Nice work keeping your arm overhead. Focus on opening your palm and fingers wide for the next part of the movement.
You're doing great opening your hand wide. Remember to inhale and make a strong fist, tightening your muscles.
Fantastic! You completed the fist and muscle tense on the inhale. Now exhale and relax, opening your hand fully.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Make sure to open your hand wide and then make a tight fist while inhaling, and relax while exhaling.
